```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment=NA)

library(jsonlite)
library(kableExtra)
minit <- read_json("minit_exco_1_22.json")
```

### Hadir: 

```{r hadir}
lst <- paste(minit$Hadir$nama,minit$Hadir$Singkatan,minit$Hadir$Jawatan,sep = " - ")
lst %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```

### Tidak Hadir (dengan maaf)

```{r tidak hadir}
nst <- paste(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Nama,minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Singkatan,minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Jawatan,sep = " - ")
nst %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```

### AGENDA 1: `r minit$Agenda$'1'$Perkara` 

```{r agenda 1, echo=FALSE}
minit$Agenda$`1`$Keterangan %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE,position = "left")
paste("@.  Keputusan.",minit$Agenda$`1`$Keputusan) %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE,position = "left")

```
